tool_description: Analyzes planetary positions to identify aspects and aspect patterns using configurable orbs and aspect types.

planet_longitudes.description: Array of planet longitude positions in degrees

planet_names.description: Names corresponding to each longitude position

aspect_types.description: Aspect types to calculate: conjunction, opposition, trine, square, sextile, quincunx, semisextile, semisquare, sesquisquare

orb_size.description: Maximum orb in degrees for aspect detection (1-10)

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: planet_longitudes and planet_names must have the same length.
Invalid orb size: Orb must be between 1 and 10 degrees.
Unknown aspect type: Use valid aspect names from the supported list.
Insufficient data: Need at least 2 planets to calculate aspects.
usage: Input planet positions and names from Planetary Position Calculator, optionally specify aspect types and orb size. Returns all detected aspects and any major aspect patterns.

planet1_names.description: First planet in each aspect pair

planet2_names.description: Second planet in each aspect pair

orbs.description: Exact orb values for each aspect

patterns.description: Names of detected aspect patterns (T-square, Grand Trine, etc.)
